abstract: Pres Lee Myung-bak of South Korea joins Pres Obama for tour of General Motors auto plant in Michigan to promote their free trade bill and assure autoworkers that free trade will not cost American jobs; Lee offers strong show of support to help Obama, who is desperately hoping workers in politically crucial state will reward him for the auto industry bailout by voting for him in the 2012 presidential election.
snippet: President Obama and President Lee Myung-bak of South Korea toured a G.M. plant as part of their free trade victory tour, and Mr. Obama’s efforts to shore up political support.
lead_paragraph: President Obama and President Lee Myung-bak of South Korea toured a G.M. plant as part of their free trade victory tour, and Mr. Obama’s efforts to shore up political support.

headline.main: South Korea’s Leader Helps Obama Woo Michigan
headline.print_headline: South Korea’s Leader Helps Obama Woo Michigan
